summary: Investigated migration display issues in project source view
Identified potential UI interaction problems with new migrations
Prepared groundwork for migration management improvements

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Migration Management Controls in Source View
suggestedTasks.description: Develop interactive controls for new migrations including ability to click, edit, and delete pending migrations. Focus on enhancing user experience in the Monaco editor for migration management. Implement validation and confirmation steps for migration deletion to prevent accidental removal.
suggestedTasks.reason: User workflow requires more robust migration handling capabilities

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Migration UI Interactions
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests to verify migration display, interaction, and management behaviors. Cover scenarios like clicking new migrations, editing migration content, and deleting migrations. Ensure test coverage includes edge cases and error handling.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation lacks test coverage for migration UI interactions

gotchas: Ensure consistent UX for new vs existing migrations

documentationNeeds: Update user guide for migration management workflow
